parameters.name: FaceUntrimType
parameters.description: Untrim face as defined in swFaceUntrimType_e

parameters.name: EdgeUntrimType
parameters.description: Untrim edge as defined in swEdgeUntrimType_e

parameters.name: Distance
parameters.description: Distance by which to untrim surface

parameters.name: BMerge
parameters.description: True to create a surface extension that merges with the original surface, false to create a new, separate surface body

title: IFeatureManager.InsertUntrimSurface
signature:
Feature InsertUntrimSurface( 
   System.Int32
FaceUntrimType
,
   System.Int32
EdgeUntrimType
,
   System.Double
Distance
,
   System.Boolean
BMerge
)

parameters.name: FaceUntrimType
parameters.description: Untrim face as defined in swFaceUntrimType_e

parameters.name: EdgeUntrimType
parameters.description: Untrim edge as defined in swEdgeUntrimType_e

parameters.name: Distance
parameters.description: Distance by which to untrim surface

parameters.name: BMerge
parameters.description: True to create a surface extension that merges with the original surface, false to create a new, separate surface body

remarks: You must preselect the face or the edges you want to untrim.
